name: Office Affliction
description:
Take control of a salaryman whose sister has fallen ill! To keep up with medical payments, you must scale the corporate ladder within your company by performing every day office activities... And sabotage...!? 

Mouse - Camera Movement 

LMB - Interact 

MMB - Leave Screen 

U - Refresh Wallpaper 

RMB - Context Menu in OS

 -Blackmail Game- 

Arrow Keys/WSAD - Move Envelope 

P - Start Game

-Team- Tomasz Galka - Lead Programmer [Main Integration of Unity assets/3D Artist]

 Munfung Look - Main 2D Artist [Story Writer]

 Cathal O'Rourke - Main 3D Artist [Programmer/Musician/Integration of Unity assets] 

Conor Dunne - Story Writer [Character Creator]
